DOC.criteria: Males , 19~60years old Bodyweight 50 kg ideal body weight within Â±30 % triglyceride ( TG ) level less 200 mg/dL Fasting blood glucose level less 100 mg/dL oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) less 140 mg/dL Able give inform consent Major medical illness cardiovascular , neurologic , psychiatric , renal , pulmonary hepatic disease History disease could interfere test product impede absorption gastrointestinal disease gastrointestinal surgery Medical psychological condition deem investigator interfere successful participation study Poor vital sign ( systolic blood pressure : 100 mmHg 150 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure : 65 mmHg above95 mmHg ) Allergic hypersensitive ingredient test product ; treat drug within past 2 week Participation clinical trial within past 2 month Alcohol consumption 21 unit per week abnormal screening laboratory test Being judge responsible physician local study center unfit participate study
